// Pivot 0, 0
int roulette[26] = {
	3, 0,
	7, 0,
	7, 12,
	11, 14,
	11, 20,
	7, 22,
	7, 34,
	3, 34,
	3, 22,
	0, 20,
	0, 15,
	3, 12,
	3, 0
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float roulette[26] = {
	0.272727f, 0.000000f,
	0.636364f, 0.000000f,
	0.636364f, 0.352941f,
	1.000000f, 0.411765f,
